bindings.name: clrAccordionMultiPanel
bindings.description: If true allows multiple panels to be open at the same time.

bindings.description: When true this disables click events from opening/closing the panel.

bindings.description: Use this to set the open or closed state of the panel. it emits the open (true)/ closed (false) state of the panel

bindings.description: The state object reflecting the page metadata (to, from size & current) and current sorting and filters applied to the data models.

bindings.description: An array of all datagrid items that are selected.

bindings.description: aria-label for the expandable row column header.

bindings.name: clrDgPreserveSelection
bindings.description: Preserve datagrid selections after filtering has occurred on the dataset.

interface.description: The (optional) starting page number for the slice of data.
The (optional) ending page number for the slice of data.
The page number for the current slice of model data.
